title: Julie Stafford's taste of life : the video
creator_credit: Martin and Rosenthal Pictures, AAV Australia, Chris Weir and Malcolm Dwyer
brief_description: Best selling cookery writer Julie Stafford invites you to prepare a variety of mouth-watering recipes for breakfast, lunch, children’s meals and dinners for everyday and for special occasions. Julie also gives a brief outline of healthy foods to eat, shows how to choose and store them and gives an introduction to some common herbs. A weekly menu planner is included.
